Following the list of libraries used in the project:
libogg-1.3.2
	https://www.xiph.org/downloads/
libvorbis-1.3.5
	https://www.xiph.org/downloads/
luaplus51-all
	https://github.com/jjensen/luaplus51-all
OpenAL-1.1 CoreSDK
	https://www.openal.org/downloads/
tinyxml2-3.0.0
	https://github.com/leethomason/tinyxml2
stb_image-2.08
	https://github.com/nothings/stb
